<!--FOOER AREA-->
<div class="footer-area">
  <div class="container wow fadeIn">
    <div class="row">
      <div class="col-md-12 col-lg-12 col-sm-12 col-xs-12">
        <div class="footer-top section-padding text-center">
          <div class="footer-logo">
            {% if image %}<a href="{{ home_url }}"><img src="{{ image }}" alt=""></a>{% endif %}
          </div>
          <div class="footer-address">
            {% if address %}<p>{{ address }}</p>{% endif %}
            {% if email %}<p><a href="mailto:{{ email }}">{{ email }}</a></p>{% endif %}
            {% if telephone %}<p><a href="callto:{{ telephone }}">{{ telephone }}</a></p>{% endif %}
          </div>
          <div class="footer-social-bookmark">
            <ul>
              {% for item in social_items %}
              <li><a href="{{ item.url }}" target="_blank"><i class="fa fa-{{ item.type }}"></i></a></li>
              {% endfor %}
            </ul>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row">
      <div class="col-md-6 col-lg-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12">
        <div class="footer-menu">
          {% if footer_menu %}
          <ul>
            {% for item in footer_menu %}
            <li><a href="{{ item.url }}">{{ item.name }}</a></li>
            {% endfor %}
          </ul>
          {% endif %}
        </div>
      </div>
      <div class="col-md-6 col-lg-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12">
        <div class="footer-copyright">
          {{ copyright|raw }}
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>
<!--FOOER AREA END-->
